column1: ・ｩ・ｽ・ｭ・ﾈ・ﾉ	katakuna ni	obstinate	"Stubborn and so strong,"

column2: mono y? omina kana na mashi
column3: the words of a woman like you
column4: Strong were the words"," words of a woman like you.""",,,,

column1: ・・・ﾟ・・	asaginu mo	in linen robes also	"Our robes are linen,"

column3: I the same as my wife
column4: Mine the same cloth as my wife's.
At the arms next", shoulders next,"
And the small collar at peace."

column1: ・・・・・ｹ・ﾟ・ｩ・・	mashi kiseme kamo	I may look at what you wear	I see only what you wear.,,,,,,
